data.name: label
data.description: The label or trigger content for the Drawer component.

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Speed of the animation when the component is shown or hidden.

data.name: backdrop
data.description: Toggle or style the Drawer backdrop.

data.name: staticBackdrop
data.description: Prevent Drawer from closing on backdrop click.

data.name: id
data.description: Unique identifier for the Drawer component.

data.name: trigger
data.description: The element that triggers the opening of the component.
